Uses of Class
gametools.Position

      Fields in gametools declared as Position 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Position Position.UNDEFINED_POSITION
      An empty position to represent a non existent or undefined point.
      Methods in gametools that return Position

      Returns a position representing one of the corners of the object.
      static Position Game.getMousePosition()

      static Position Tools.pt(double x, double y)
      The short form notation for creating a position.
      Methods in gametools with parameters of type Position 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Uses trigonometry to calculate the angle to the specified position.
      static Area Tools.ar(Position pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      The short form notation for creating an area.
      static Area Tools.ar(Position tl, Position br)
      Converts two points to an area object going through those positions.
      void Area.centerOn(Position pos)
      Centers the object around the specified coordinates.
      double Position.dist(Position pos)
      Calculates the distance between two positions using pythagorean theorem.
      void Sprite.face(Position pos)
      Sets the angle of the sprite to face the specified position.
      boolean Area.isWithin(Position pos)
      Checks if a point is within the object.
      void Sprite.moveConstantlyTo(Position pos)
      Moves the sprite constantly to the specified position until it gets removed or it goes outside its movement area.
      void Sprite.moveTo(Position pos)
      Moves the sprite to the coordinates at the set speed.
      void Position.rotate(Position mid, double ang)
      Rotates the point around the specified position.
      void Position.set(Position pos)
      Copies over the x and and y from the specified position.
      void Area.setArea(Position pos, java.awt.Dimension size)
      Sets both the position and the dimensions of the object.
      void Area.setPosition(Position pos)
      Sets the x and y position of the object at once.
      void Position.setPosition(Position pos)
      Copies over the x and and y from the specified position.
      void Position.trans(Position trans)
      Translates the position and adds the passed in values to the x and y.
      void Position.translate(Position trans)
      Translates the position and adds the passed in values to the x and y.
      void Sprite.turnTo(Position pos)
      Turns the sprite until it faces the specified position.
      Constructors in gametools with parameters of type Position 
      Constructor and Description
      Area(Position pos)
      Creates an area on the specified position with dimensions of zero.

      Creates an area at the x and y with the specified dimensions.
      Position(Position pos)
      Creates a position and then copies over the coordinates from the specified position.

      Creates a sprite at the specified coordinates with a custom animation.
